urls.description: Now in its 16th year, the Secretary of State’s International Women of Courage (IWOC) Award recognizes women from around the globe who have demonstrated exceptional courage, strength, and leadership in advocating for peace, justice, human rights, gender equity and equality, and the empowerment of women and girls, in all their diversity – often at great personal risk and sacrifice. Since March 2007, the Department of State has recognized more than 170 women from over 80 countries with the IWOC Award. U.S.

It’s a good day in our fight against the climate crisis, as the United States is once again a Party to the Paris Agreement. The work to reduce our emissions has already begun, and we will waste no time in engaging our partners around the world to build our global resilience.

It is 2021, and we are just getting started. Rallying the world to address the massive challenge of climate change requires all hands on deck. @USAndIndia Hi, I had applied for an F1 visa at the US Consulate Mumbai on 19th August 2020. I was asked to submit documents according to the 221(g) blue letter. It's been more than 120 days since I have submitted my documents. When can I expect a decision about the same?

@USAndIndia @USAndIndia : when will H1b and H4 processing open? How come H1b and H4 visas less important then F1 visas? @KamalaHarris @JoeBiden : please help prevent families from getting separated. People are losing jobs because they cant get stamping to return back.
@USAndIndia Is there any tentative date on resumption of B2 type visa appointments..?

@USAndIndia Families are separated due to h1b ban, it should take precedence over student visa. So many people stuck in India while their job, home, and family is at risk, for lease resume h1b appointments
@USAndIndia Kindly consider H4 spouse and kids as well are waiting long time to get united with family. Please🙏🏼
@USAndIndia What about H1B visas?

@USAndIndia Do u even realize what all happens when a person is not able to visa for h1! People r stuck with no jobs in India, family, house & car in USA! They literally would need to uproot & come back to India! Such mental trauma! Atleast give a proper response & open up!!!
@USAndIndia Kindly update us on H1 visas.

@USAndIndia @USAndMumbai @USAndHyderabad @USAndKolkata Kindly open consulates for normal processing atleast provide eta why u r nt posting any update? Just posting one same update there is no set date.. please provide eta atleast people will change US plans
@USAndIndia Are there any updates for H1B visas? There are many of us hoping to reunite with our families after several months of hardship.
@USAndIndia Can you please provide an update on H4 visas?
@USAndIndia Hi, Family separation is as important as student visa. There are spouses and kids waiting over 10 months. Please consider releasing appointments for H4  spouses at least.

@USAndIndia About h1b visa dropbox, can you please provide details if 24 months expiry rule will be extended beyond 31st Dec 2020?
It will be really helpful for us to plan better.
@USAndIndia what about F3 Category? @USAndMumbai
@USAndIndia @USAndChennai Kindly let us know about appointments for L1B.
@USAndIndia Please call H1B 221G for F2F. We have been stuck for more than a year.
@USAndIndia Any further update on J1 visa would be really helpful
